gold.name: CGI
gold.description: Founded in 1976, CGI is a leading global IT and business consulting firm. We offer insights-driven, outcomes-based services to boost your investment returns. Operating in 21 industries across 400 locations, we deliver scalable, sustainable solutions.

gold.name: DigitalOcean
gold.description: DigitalOcean is one of the world’s fastest growing cloud computing platforms focused on simplifying cloud infrastructure for software developers and startups. The company is headquartered in New York City with 15 datacenters across the world.

silver.name: Revel IT
silver.description: Revel IT delivers top talent through a unique recruiting process and a dedicated sales and recruiting team. We specialize in IT consulting, staffing solutions, and talent development, fostering a skilled workforce through strategic partnerships.

bronze.name: Central Insurance
bronze.description: Founded as the Central Mutual Insurance Company in 1876, Central Insurance has evolved into a successful property and casualty group operating on a strong foundation of core values including Integrity, Relationships, and Excellence.

bronze.name: IGS
bronze.description: IGS Energy is a family-owned energy company serving over 1 million customers. They offer green electricity, carbon-neutral natural gas, solar solutions, and home warranty plans, emphasizing sustainability and tailored energy strategies.

bronze.name: NetJets
bronze.description: NetJets operates the largest, most diverse private aircraft fleet in the world and offers a full range of personalized private aviation solutions to meet—and exceed—the high standards of the world's most discerning travelers.

bronze.name: OCLC
bronze.description: At OCLC, we exist because what is known must be shared. On the surface this seems simple. But dig deeper. We hold petabytes of diverse data in different languages, different scripts, and different formats.

bronze.name: Improving
bronze.description: Improving is a digital services company that provides enterprise software consulting, development, and training to large enterprises worldwide.

bronze.name: BPS Technologies
bronze.description: BPS Technologies provides IT Consulting, Staff Augmentation, and Managed IT Services, delivering innovative solutions and top IT talent to drive success.

community.name: Progress
community.description: Progress (NASDAQ: PRGS) offers the leading platform for developing and deploying mission-critical business applications. The creator of the award-winning Telerik .NET and Kendo UI JavaScript user interface components/controls, reporting solutions and productivity tools, Progress offers all the tools developers need to build high-performance modern apps with outstanding UI. Learn more about the Progress developer tools at: www.telerik.com or 1-781-280-4000.

community.name: Leading EDJE
community.description: Leading EDJE helps our partners solve their most complex business challenges by building the highest quality custom solutions….and we do it better than anyone else! Since 2007, we have created a unique culture which promotes high positive energy with an entrepreneurial spirit. Our firm is made of exceptionally talented professionals who deliver exceptional results, and our clients are made from a wide array of industries but have a common goal of choosing a partner who provides distinct, creative solutions. We choose to work and live deliberately via our uncompromising core values, of Put Team First, Is Dedicated to Growth, Does the Right Thing…Not the Right Now Thing, Is Authentic and Clear and Approaches Problem Solving Passionately.

community.name: GemCity TECH
community.description: GemCity TECH is a family of user groups bringing tech-focused content to the Dayton Ohio community. Our calendar is filled with opportunities to learn and share information with other technology enthusiasts. GemCity TECH’s mission is to grow the local industry and the community by providing a centralized destination for technical training, workshops and collaborating. Join us to nurture your passion for technology and be a part of shaping the future of the GemCity TECH community.

community.name: Flash Fun Party Rentals
community.description: At Flash Fun Photo Booth and Party Rentals, we’re all about bringing your events to life with unforgettable memories and exciting experiences! Serving Central Ohio, we specialize in premium photo booth rentals and party essentials that elevate any celebration, from weddings and corporate events to birthdays and graduations.

community.name: Glenn Harmon Photography
community.description: Glenn Harmon Jr. is a long time Stir Trek community member and also a photographer helping with the event.
